amendment.description: To prohibit the use of fund for certain activities relating to advanced nuclear weapons concepts, including the robust nuclear earth penetrator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1659 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1659 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S11534-11538; text: CR H11534) To prohibit the use of fund for certain activities relating to advanced nuclear weapons concepts, including the robust nuclear earth penetrator.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1659 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1659 proposed by Senator Reed.
